Desc.eng: What are you doing here, little gnome? I thought you wanted to go home to your family.

I hate to disappoint you, but this is my home. Or it used to be. While I was gone, the Inkstorm disgorged a tide of monsters here from the void. My family is in hiding and we can't return until someone destroys this infestation. Could you help us out?

I really want to tell you how grateful I am for destroying those Inkgrubs. Butâ€¦ umm.. while I was gone, the Inkstorm disgorged a tide of monsters from the void here. My family is in hiding and we can't return until someone destroys this infestation. Could you help us out?
How could I say no? Being a monster hunter and all that...
I have a secret cult to catch. I'll kill anything that stands between me and the gate out of here, but that's all I can do.
The monster infestation is gone, your families can return now.
